description: A "charter of values" is the latest effort by the French state to win Muslim hearts and minds.
title: France Islam: Muslims under pressure to sign French values charter
title_page: France Islam: Muslims under pressure to sign French values charter - BBC News
maintext: "We do not all agree on what this charter of values is, and what it will contain," said Chems-Eddine Hafiz, vice-president of the CFCM and Rector of the Paris Grand Mosque. But, he said, "we are at a historic turning point for Islam in France [and] we Muslims are facing our responsibilities".
